00023 // Adds a soldier to a world gridno and set's direction
00024 void AddSoldierToSectorGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection, BOOLEAN fUseAnimation, UINT16 usAnimState, UINT16 usAnimCode );
00025 
00026 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection, BOOLEAN fClosestToMerc );

00028 
00029 // SO, STEPS IN CREATING A MERC!
00030 
00031 // 1 ) Setup the SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT
00032 //                Among other things, this struct needs a sSectorX, sSectorY, and a valid InsertionDirection
00033 //                and InsertionGridNo.
00034 //                This GridNo will be determined by a prevouis function that will examine the sector
00035 //                Infomration regarding placement positions and pick one
00036 // 2 ) Call TacticalCreateSoldier() which will create our soldier
00037 //                What it does is:  Creates a soldier in the MercPtrs[] array.
00038 //                                                                      Allocates the Animation cache for this merc
00039 //                                                                      Loads up the intial aniamtion file
00040 //                                                                      Creates initial palettes, etc
00041 //                                                                      And other cool things.
00042 //                Now we have an allocated soldier, we just need to set him in the world!
00043 // 3) When we want them in the world, call AddSoldierToSector().
00044 //                This function sets the graphic in the world, lighting effects, etc
00045 //                It also formally adds it to the TacticalSoldier slot and interface panel slot.                  
00046 
00047 
00048 
00049 //Kris:  modified to actually path from sweetspot to gridno.  Previously, it only checked if the
00050 //destination was sittable (though it was possible that that location would be trapped.
00051 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection )
00052 {
00053       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00054       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00055       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00056       INT16       sGridNo;
00057       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00058       INT16       sLowestGridNo=-1;
00059       INT32                         leftmost;
00060       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00061       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
00062       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00063       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00064 
00065       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
00066       //far away the pathing will consider.
00067       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
00068       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
00069       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00070       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
00071 
00072       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00073       //reachable.
00074       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00075       soldier.bLevel = 0;
00076       soldier.bTeam = 1;
00077       soldier.sGridNo = sSweetGridNo;
00078  
00079       sTop        = ubRadius;
00080       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00081       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00082       sRight  = ubRadius;
00083 
00084       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
00085       //in the square region.
00086       // ATE: CHECK FOR BOUNDARIES!!!!!!
00087       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00088       {
00089             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00090 
00091             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00092             {
00093                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00094                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00095                   {
00096                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00097                   }
00098             }
00099       }
00100 
00101       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
00102       //(use the fake soldier and the pathing settings)
00103       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, ( PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST | PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) );
00104       
00105       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00106 
00107       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00108       {
00109             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00110 
00111             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00112             {
00113                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00114                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) 
00115                         && gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00116                   {
00117                         // Go on sweet stop
00118                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00119                         {
00120                               // ATE: INstead of using absolute range, use the path cost!
00121                           //uiRange = PlotPath( &soldier, sGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, WALKING, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, 50 );
00122                               uiRange = CardinalSpacesAway( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00123                               
00124                         //    if ( uiRange == 0 )
00125                         //    {
00126                         //          uiRange = 999999;
00127                         //    }
00128 
00129                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00130                               {
00131                                     sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00132                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00133                                     fFound = TRUE;
00134                               }
00135                         }
00136                   }
00137             }
00138       }
00139       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00140       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00141       if ( fFound )
00142       {
00143             // Set direction to center of map!
00144             *pubDirection =  (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sLowestGridNo, ( ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * WORLD_COLS ) + ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) ) );
00145             return( sLowestGridNo );
00146       }
00147       else
00148       {
00149             return( NOWHERE );
00150       }
00151 }

00253 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection, BOOLEAN fClosestToMerc )
00254 {
00255       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00256       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00257       INT16  cnt1, cnt2, cnt3;
00258       INT16       sGridNo;
00259       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00260       INT16       sLowestGridNo=-1;
00261       INT32                         leftmost;
00262       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00263       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
00264       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00265       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00266       UINT8 ubBestDirection=0;
00267 
00268       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
00269       //far away the pathing will consider.
00270       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
00271       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
00272       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00273       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
00274 
00275       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00276       //reachable.
00277       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00278       soldier.bLevel = 0;
00279       soldier.bTeam = 1;
00280       soldier.sGridNo = sSweetGridNo;
00281 
00282       sTop        = ubRadius;
00283       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00284       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00285       sRight  = ubRadius;
00286 
00287   // If we are already at this gridno....
00288   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sSweetGridNo && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
00289   {
00290     *pubDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
00291     return( sSweetGridNo );
00292   }
00293 
00294       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
00295       //in the square region.
00296       // ATE: CHECK FOR BOUNDARIES!!!!!!
00297       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00298       {
00299             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00300 
00301             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00302             {
00303                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00304                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00305                   {
00306                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00307                   }
00308             }
00309       }
00310 
00311       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
00312       //(use the fake soldier and the pathing settings)
00313       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, ( PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST | PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) );
00314       
00315       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00316 
00317       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00318       {
00319             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00320 
00321             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00322             {
00323                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00324                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) 
00325                         && gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00326                   {
00327                         // Go on sweet stop
00328                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00329                         {
00330                               BOOLEAN fDirectionFound = FALSE;
00331                               UINT16      usOKToAddStructID;
00332                               STRUCTURE_FILE_REF * pStructureFileRef;
00333                               UINT16                                           usAnimSurface;
00334 
00335                               if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL )
00336                               {
00337                                     if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
00338                                     {
00339                                           usOKToAddStructID = pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
00340                                     }
00341                                     else
00342                                     {
00343                                           usOKToAddStructID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
00344                                     }
00345                               }
00346                               else
00347                               {
00348                                     usOKToAddStructID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
00349                               }
00350 
00351                               // Get animation surface...
00352                               usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, usAnimState );
00353                               // Get structure ref...
00354                               pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, usAnimState );
00355 
00356                               if( !pStructureFileRef )
00357                               {
00358                                     Assert( 0 );
00359                               }
00360 
00361                               // Check each struct in each direction
00362                               for( cnt3 = 0; cnt3 < 8; cnt3++ )
00363                               {
00364                                     if (OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16)sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[gOneCDirection[ cnt3 ]]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
00365                                     {
00366                                           fDirectionFound = TRUE;
00367                                           break;
00368                                     }
00369 
00370                               }
00371 
00372                               if ( fDirectionFound )
00373                               {
00374                                     if ( fClosestToMerc )
00375                                     {
00376                               uiRange = FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 );
00377 
00378               if (uiRange == 0 )
00379               {
00380                 uiRange = 999;
00381               }
00382                                     }
00383                                     else
00384                                     {
00385                                           uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00386                                     }
00387 
00388                                     if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00389                                     {
00390                                           ubBestDirection = (UINT8)cnt3;
00391                                           sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00392                                           uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00393                                           fFound = TRUE;
00394                                     }
00395                               }
00396                         }
00397                   }
00398             }
00399       }
00400       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00401       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00402       if ( fFound )
00403       {
00404             // Set direction we chose...
00405             *pubDirection = ubBestDirection;
00406 
00407             return( sLowestGridNo );
00408       }
00409       else
00410       {
00411             return( NOWHERE );
00412       }
00413 }

00416 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataUsingGivenDirectionFirst( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection, BOOLEAN fClosestToMerc, INT8 bGivenDirection )

00544                                 }
00545           }
00546 
00547                               if ( fDirectionFound )
00548                               {
00549                                     if ( fClosestToMerc )
00550                                     {
00551                               uiRange = FindBestPath( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, 0 );
00552 
00553               if (uiRange == 0 )
00554               {
00555                 uiRange = 999;
00556               }
00557                                     }
00558                                     else
00559                                     {
00560                                           uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00561                                     }
00562 
00563                                     if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00564                                     {
00565                                           ubBestDirection = (UINT8)cnt3;
00566                                           sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00567                                           uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00568                                           fFound = TRUE;
00569                                     }
00570                               }
00571                         }
00572                   }
00573             }
00574       }
00575       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00576       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00577       if ( fFound )
00578       {
00579             // Set direction we chose...
00580             *pubDirection = ubBestDirection;
00581 
00582             return( sLowestGridNo );
00583       }
00584       else
00585       {
00586             return( NOWHERE );
00587       }
00588 }

00590 
00591 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usAnimState, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection, BOOLEAN fClosestToMerc, SOLDIERTYPE *pSrcSoldier )
00592 {
00593       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00594       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00595       INT16  cnt1, cnt2, cnt3;
00596       INT16       sGridNo;
00597       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00598       INT16       sLowestGridNo=-1;
00599       INT32                         leftmost;
00600       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00601       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00602       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00603       UINT8 ubBestDirection=0;
00604       INT16 sSweetGridNo;
00605       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
00606       
00607       sSweetGridNo = pSrcSoldier->sGridNo;
00608 
00609 
00610       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
00611       //far away the pathing will consider.
00612       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
00613       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
00614       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00615       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
00616 
00617       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00618       //reachable.
00619       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00620       soldier.bLevel = 0;
00621       soldier.bTeam = 1;
00622       soldier.sGridNo = sSweetGridNo;
00623 
00624       sTop        = ubRadius;
00625       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00626       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00627       sRight  = ubRadius;
00628 
00629       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
00630       //in the square region.
00631       // ATE: CHECK FOR BOUNDARIES!!!!!!
00632       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00633       {
00634             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00635 
00636             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00637             {
00638                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00639                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00640                   {
00641                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00642                   }
00643             }
00644       }
00645 
00646       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
00647       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, ( PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST | PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) );
00648       
00649       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00650 
00651       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00652       {
00653             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00654 
00655             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00656             {
00657                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00658                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) 
00659                         && gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00660                   {
00661                         // Go on sweet stop
00662                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00663                         {
00664                               BOOLEAN fDirectionFound = FALSE;
00665                               UINT16      usOKToAddStructID;
00666                               STRUCTURE_FILE_REF * pStructureFileRef;
00667                               UINT16                                           usAnimSurface;
00668 
00669                               if ( fClosestToMerc != 3 )
00670                               {
00671                                     if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
00672                                     {
00673                                           usOKToAddStructID = pSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
00674                                     }
00675                                     else
00676                                     {
00677                                           usOKToAddStructID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
00678                                     }
00679 
00680                                     // Get animation surface...
00681                                     usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, usAnimState );
00682                                     // Get structure ref...
00683                                     pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, usAnimState );
00684 
00685                                     // Check each struct in each direction
00686                                     for( cnt3 = 0; cnt3 < 8; cnt3++ )
00687                                     {
00688                                           if (OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16)sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[gOneCDirection[ cnt3 ]]), usOKToAddStructID ) )
00689                                           {
00690                                                 fDirectionFound = TRUE;
00691                                                 break;
00692                                           }
00693 
00694                                     }
00695                               }
00696                               else
00697                               {
00698                                     fDirectionFound = TRUE;
00699                                     cnt3 = (UINT8)Random( 8 );
00700                               }
00701 
00702                               if ( fDirectionFound )
00703                               {
00704                                     if ( fClosestToMerc == 1 )
00705                                     {
00706                                           uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
00707                                     }
00708                                     else if ( fClosestToMerc == 2 )
00709                                     {
00710                                           uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) + GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00711                                     }
00712                                     else
00713                                     {
00714                                           //uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00715                                           uiRange = abs((sSweetGridNo / MAXCOL) - (sGridNo / MAXCOL)) +
00716                                                 abs((sSweetGridNo % MAXROW) - (sGridNo % MAXROW));
00717                                     }
00718 
00719                                     if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange || (uiRange == uiLowestRange && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) < PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sLowestGridNo ) ) )
00720                                     {
00721                                           ubBestDirection = (UINT8)cnt3;
00722                                           sLowestGridNo           = sGridNo;
00723                                           uiLowestRange           = uiRange;
00724                                           fFound = TRUE;
00725                                     }
00726                               }
00727                         }
00728                   }
00729             }
00730       }
00731       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00732       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00733       if ( fFound )
00734       {
00735             // Set direction we chose...
00736             *pubDirection = ubBestDirection;
00737 
00738             return( sLowestGridNo );
00739       }
00740       else
00741       {
00742             return( NOWHERE );
00743       }
00744 }

00747 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection )
00748 {
00749       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00750       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00751       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00752       INT16       sGridNo;
00753       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00754       INT16       sLowestGridNo=-1;
00755       INT32                         leftmost;
00756       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00757 
00758 
00759       sTop        = ubRadius;
00760       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00761       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00762       sRight  = ubRadius;
00763 
00764       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00765 
00766       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00767       {
00768             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00769 
00770             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00771             {
00772                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00773 
00774                   if ( sSweetGridNo == sGridNo )
00775                   {
00776                         continue;
00777                   }
00778 
00779                   if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && 
00780                                sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00781                   {
00782 
00783                               // Go on sweet stop
00784                               if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00785                               {
00786                                     uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSweetGridNo, sGridNo );
00787 
00788                                     if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00789                                     {
00790                                           sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00791                                           uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00792 
00793                                           fFound = TRUE;
00794                                     }
00795                               }
00796                   }
00797             }
00798 
00799       }
00800 
00801       if ( fFound )
00802       {
00803             // Set direction to center of map!
00804             *pubDirection =  (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sLowestGridNo, ( ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * WORLD_COLS ) + ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) ) );
00805 
00806             return( sLowestGridNo );
00807       }
00808       else
00809       {
00810             return( NOWHERE );
00811       }     
00812 }

00888 
00889 BOOLEAN CanSoldierReachGridNoInGivenTileLimit( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sMaxTiles, INT8 bLevel )
00890 {
00891       INT32 iNumTiles;
00892       INT16 sActionGridNo;
00893       UINT8 ubDirection;
00894 
00895       if ( pSoldier->bLevel != bLevel )
00896       {
00897             return( FALSE );
00898       }
00899 
00900       sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, FALSE );
00901 
00902       if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
00903       {
00904             sActionGridNo = sGridNo;            
00905       }
00906 
00907       if ( sActionGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo )
00908       {
00909             return( TRUE );
00910       }
00911 
00912       iNumTiles = FindBestPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST );
00913 
00914       if ( iNumTiles <= sMaxTiles && iNumTiles != 0 )
00915       {
00916             return( TRUE );
00917       }
00918       else
00919       {
00920             return( FALSE );
00921       }
00922 }

00924 
00925 UINT16 FindRandomGridNoFromSweetSpot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection )
00926 {
00927       INT16       sX, sY;
00928       INT16       sGridNo;
00929       INT32                         leftmost;
00930       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00931       UINT32            cnt = 0;
00932       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
00933       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00934       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00935       UINT8 ubBestDirection=0;
00936       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00937       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00938       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00939       UINT8  ubRoomNum;
00940 
00941       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
00942       //far away the pathing will consider.
00943       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
00944       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
00945       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00946       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
00947 
00948       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00949       //reachable.
00950       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00951       soldier.bLevel = 0;
00952       soldier.bTeam = 1;
00953       soldier.sGridNo = sSweetGridNo;
00954 
00955       sTop        = ubRadius;
00956       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00957       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00958       sRight  = ubRadius;
00959 
00960       // ATE: CHECK FOR BOUNDARIES!!!!!!
00961       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00962       {
00963             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00964 
00965             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00966             {
00967                   sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00968                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00969                   {
00970                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00971                   }
00972             }
00973       }
00974 
00975       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
00976       //(use the fake soldier and the pathing settings)
00977       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, ( PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST | PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) );
00978 
00979       do
00980       {
00981             sX = (UINT16)Random( ubRadius );
00982             sY = (UINT16)Random( ubRadius );
00983 
00984             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00985 
00986             sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) + sX;
00987 
00988             if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && 
00989                          sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) 
00990                         && gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00991             {
00992                   // Go on sweet stop
00993                   if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE , pSoldier->bLevel) )
00994                   {
00995                         // If we are a crow, we need this additional check
00996                         if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
00997                         {
00998                               if ( !InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoomNum ) )
00999                               {
01000                                     fFound = TRUE;
01001                               }
01002                         }
01003                         else
01004                         {
01005                               fFound = TRUE;
01006                         }
01007                   }
01008             }
01009 
01010             cnt++;
01011 
01012             if ( cnt > 2000 )
01013             {
01014                   return( NOWHERE );
01015             }
01016 
01017       } while( !fFound );
01018 
01019       // Set direction to center of map!
01020       *pubDirection =  (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sGridNo, ( ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * WORLD_COLS ) + ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) ) );
01021 
01022       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
01023       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
01024 
01025       return( sGridNo );
01026 
01027 }
01028 
01029 UINT16 FindRandomGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection )
01030 {
01031       INT16       sX, sY;
01032       INT16       sGridNo;
01033       INT32                         leftmost;
01034       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
01035       UINT32            cnt = 0;
01036 
01037       do
01038       {
01039             sX = (UINT16)Random( ubRadius );
01040             sY = (UINT16)Random( ubRadius );
01041 
01042             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
01043 
01044             sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) + sX;
01045 
01046             if ( sGridNo == sSweetGridNo )
01047             {
01048                   continue;
01049             }
01050 
01051             if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && 
01052                          sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
01053             {
01054                   // Go on sweet stop
01055                   if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
01056                   {
01057                         fFound = TRUE;
01058                   }
01059             }
01060 
01061             cnt++;
01062 
01063             if ( cnt > 2000 )
01064             {
01065                   return( NOWHERE );
01066             }
01067 
01068       } while( !fFound );
01069 
01070       // Set direction to center of map!
01071       *pubDirection =  (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sGridNo, ( ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * WORLD_COLS ) + ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) ) );
01072 
01073       return( sGridNo );
01074 
01075 }

01077 
01078 BOOLEAN InternalAddSoldierToSector( UINT8 ubID, BOOLEAN fCalculateDirection, BOOLEAN fUseAnimation, UINT16 usAnimState, UINT16 usAnimCode )
01079 {
01080       UINT8                         ubDirection, ubCalculatedDirection;
01081       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
01082       INT16                         sGridNo;
01083       INT16                         sExitGridNo;
01084 
01085       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("InternalAddSoldierToSector"));
01086 
01087       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
01088       
01089       if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
01090       {
01091     // ATE: Make sure life of elliot is OK if from a meanwhile
01092     if ( AreInMeanwhile() && pSoldier->ubProfile == ELLIOT )
01093     {
01094       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
01095       {
01096         pSoldier->bLife = 25;
01097       }
01098     }
01099 
01100             // ADD SOLDIER TO SLOT!
01101             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_OFF_MAP)
01102             {
01103                   AddAwaySlot( pSoldier );
01104 
01105                   // Guy is NOT "in sector"
01106                   pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
01107 
01108             }
01109             else
01110             {
01111                   AddMercSlot( pSoldier );            
01112 
01113                   // Add guy to sector flag
01114                   pSoldier->bInSector = TRUE;
01115 
01116             }
01117 
01118             // If a driver or passenger - stop here!
01119             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DRIVER || pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PASSENGER )
01120             {
01121                   return( FALSE );
01122             }
01123 
01124             // Add to panel 
01125             CheckForAndAddMercToTeamPanel( pSoldier );
01126 
01127             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SPOTTING_CREATURE_ATTACK);
01128             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SMELLED_CREATURE);
01129             pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_WORRIED_ABOUT_CREATURES);
01130 
01131             // Add to interface if the are ours
01132             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
01133             {
01134                   sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( pSoldier, STANDING, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, 7, &ubCalculatedDirection, FALSE );
01135                   if( fCalculateDirection )
01136                         ubDirection = ubCalculatedDirection;
01137                   else
01138                         ubDirection = pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection;
01139             }
01140             else
01141             {
01142                   if( pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo == NOWHERE )
01143                   { //Add the soldier to the respective entrypoint.  This is an error condition.
01144 
01145                         
01146                   }
01147                   if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
01148                   {
01149                         sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataUsingGivenDirectionFirst( pSoldier, STANDING, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, 12, &ubCalculatedDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection );
01150         // ATE: Override insertion direction
01151                         pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = ubCalculatedDirection;
01152                   }
01153                   else
01154                   {
01155                         sGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, 7, &ubCalculatedDirection );
01156 
01157         // ATE: Error condition - if nowhere use insertion gridno!
01158         if ( sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01159         {
01160           sGridNo = pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo;
01161         }
01162                   }
01163 
01164                   // Override calculated direction if we were told to....
01165                   if ( pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection > 100 )
01166                   {
01167                         pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection - 100;
01168                         fCalculateDirection = FALSE;
01169                   }
01170 
01171                   if ( fCalculateDirection )
01172                   {
01173                         ubDirection = ubCalculatedDirection;
01174 
01175                         // Check if we need to get direction from exit grid...
01176                         if ( pSoldier->bUseExitGridForReentryDirection )
01177                         {
01178                               pSoldier->bUseExitGridForReentryDirection = FALSE;
01179 
01180                               // OK, we know there must be an exit gridno SOMEWHERE close...
01181                               sExitGridNo = FindClosestExitGrid( pSoldier, sGridNo, 10 );
01182 
01183                               if ( sExitGridNo != NOWHERE )
01184                               {
01185                                     // We found one
01186                                     // Calculate direction...
01187                                     ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sExitGridNo, sGridNo );                                
01188                               }
01189                         }
01190                   }
01191                   else
01192                   {
01193                         ubDirection = pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection;
01194                   }
01195             }
01196 
01197             //Add
01198             if(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
01199                   AddSoldierToSectorGridNo( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, fUseAnimation, usAnimState, usAnimCode );
01200             else
01201                   AddSoldierToSectorGridNo( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubDirection, fUseAnimation, usAnimState, usAnimCode );
01202 
01203             CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( pSoldier );
01204 
01205             return( TRUE );
01206       }
01207 
01208       return( FALSE );
01209 }
01210 
01211 
01212 BOOLEAN AddSoldierToSector( UINT8 ubID )
01213 {
01214       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierToSector"));
01215       return( InternalAddSoldierToSector( ubID, TRUE, FALSE, 0 , 0) );
01216 }

01231 void InternalSoldierInSectorSleep( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fDoTransition )
01232 {
01233       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
01234       UINT8 ubNewDirection;
01235       INT16 sGoodGridNo;
01236       UINT16      usAnim = SLEEPING;
01237 
01238       if ( !pSoldier->bInSector )
01239       {
01240             return;
01241       }
01242 
01243       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
01244       {
01245          usAnim = STANDING;
01246       }
01247 
01248       // OK, look for sutable placement....
01249       sGoodGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( pSoldier, usAnim, sGridNo, 5, &ubNewDirection, FALSE );
01250 
01251       sWorldX = CenterX( sGoodGridNo );
01252       sWorldY = CenterY( sGoodGridNo );
01253 
01254       EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, sWorldX, sWorldY );
01255 
01256       EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubNewDirection );
01257       EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubNewDirection );
01258 
01259       //pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
01260 
01261       if ( AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
01262       {
01263             EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
01264       }
01265       else
01266       {
01267             if ( fDoTransition )
01268             {
01269                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, GOTO_SLEEP, 1, TRUE );
01270             }
01271             else
01272             {
01273                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, SLEEPING, 1, TRUE );
01274             }
01275       }
01276 }

01418 extern void EVENT_SetSoldierPositionAndMaybeFinalDestAndMaybeNotDestination( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dNewXPos, FLOAT dNewYPos, BOOLEAN fUpdateDest,  BOOLEAN fUpdateFinalDest );
01419 
01420 void AddSoldierToSectorGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDirection, BOOLEAN fUseAnimation, UINT16 usAnimState, UINT16 usAnimCode )
01421 {
01422       INT16 sWorldX, sWorldY;
01423       INT16 sNewGridNo;
01424       UINT8 ubNewDirection;
01425       UINT8 ubInsertionCode;
01426       BOOLEAN fUpdateFinalPosition = TRUE;
01427 
01428       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddSoldierToSectorGridNo"));
01429 
01430       // Add merc to gridno
01431       sWorldX = CenterX( sGridNo );
01432       sWorldY = CenterY( sGridNo );
01433 
01434       // Set reserved location!
01435       pSoldier->sReservedMovementGridNo = NOWHERE;
01436 
01437       // Save OLD insertion code.. as this can change...
01438       ubInsertionCode = pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01439 
01440       // Remove any pending animations
01441       pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01442       pSoldier->usPendingAnimation2 = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01443       pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01444       pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01445 
01446       //If we are not loading a saved game
01447       if( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01448       {
01449             // Set final dest to be the same...
01450             fUpdateFinalPosition = FALSE;
01451       }
01452 
01453 
01454       // If this is a special insertion location, get path!
01455       if ( ubInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME )
01456       {
01457             EVENT_SetSoldierPositionAndMaybeFinalDestAndMaybeNotDestination( pSoldier, sWorldX, sWorldY, fUpdateFinalPosition, fUpdateFinalPosition );
01458             EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
01459             EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
01460       }
01461       else if ( ubInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_CHOPPER )
01462       {
01463 
01464       }
01465       else
01466       {
01467             EVENT_SetSoldierPositionAndMaybeFinalDestAndMaybeNotDestination( pSoldier, sWorldX, sWorldY, fUpdateFinalPosition, fUpdateFinalPosition );
01468 
01469             //if we are loading, dont set the direction ( they are already set )
01470             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01471             {
01472                   EVENT_SetSoldierDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
01473 
01474                   EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDirection );
01475             }
01476       }
01477 
01478       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01479       {
01480             if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
01481             {
01482                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01483                   {
01484                         RevealRoofsAndItems( pSoldier, TRUE, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel, TRUE );
01485 
01486         // ATE: Patch fix: If we are in an non-interruptable animation, stop!
01487         if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == HOPFENCE )
01488         {
01489           pSoldier->fInNonintAnim = FALSE;
01490           SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01491         }
01492 
01493                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, sGridNo, ubDirection );
01494                   }
01495             }
01496 
01497             // If just arriving, set a destination to walk into from!
01498             if ( ubInsertionCode == INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME )
01499             {
01500                   // Find a sweetspot near...
01501                   sNewGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpot( pSoldier, gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo, 4, &ubNewDirection );
01502                   EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, WALKING );         
01503             }
01504 
01505             // If he's an enemy... set presence
01506             if ( !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
01507             {
01508       // ATE: Added if not bloodcats
01509       // only do this once they are seen.....
01510       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType != BLOODCAT )
01511       {
01512                     SetEnemyPresence( );
01513       }
01514             }
01515       }
01516 
01517       if ( !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
01518       {
01519             //if we are loading a 'pristine' map ( ie, not loading a saved game )
01520             if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
01521             {
01522                   // ATE: Double check if we are on the roof that there is a roof there!
01523                   if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 1 )
01524                   {
01525                         if ( !FindStructure( pSoldier->sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF ) )
01526                         {
01527                               SetSoldierHeight( pSoldier, (FLOAT)( 0 )  );
01528                         }
01529                   }
01530 
01531                   if ( ubInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME )
01532                   {
01533                         // default to standing on arrival
01534                         if ( pSoldier->usAnimState != HELIDROP )
01535                         {
01536                               if ( fUseAnimation )
01537                               {
01538                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, usAnimState, usAnimCode, TRUE );
01539                               }
01540                               else if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType != CROW )
01541                               {
01542                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STANDING, 1, TRUE );
01543                               }
01544                         }
01545 
01546                         // ATE: if we are below OK life, make them lie down!
01547                         if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
01548                         {
01549                               SoldierInSectorIncompaciated( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo );
01550                         }
01551                         else if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE )
01552                         {
01553                               InternalSoldierInSectorSleep( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo, FALSE );
01554                         }
01555                         else if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == PATIENT )
01556                         {
01557                               SoldierInSectorPatient( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo );
01558                         }
01559                         else if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == DOCTOR )
01560                         {
01561                               SoldierInSectorDoctor( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo );
01562                         }
01563                         else if ( pSoldier->bAssignment == REPAIR )
01564                         {
01565                               SoldierInSectorRepair( pSoldier, pSoldier->sInsertionGridNo );
01566                         }
01567 
01568         // ATE: Make sure movement mode is up to date!
01569                   pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight ); 
01570 
01571                   }
01572             }
01573             else
01574             {
01575                   // THIS ALL SHOULD HAVE BEEN HANDLED BY THE FACT THAT A GAME WAS LOADED
01576 
01577                   //EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState, pSoldier->usAniCode, TRUE );
01578 
01579                   // if the merc had a final destination, get the merc walking there
01580                   //if( pSoldier->sFinalDestination != pSoldier->sGridNo )
01581                   //{
01582                   //    EVENT_GetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
01583                   //}
01584             }
01585       }
01586 }

01591 // IsMercOnTeam() checks to see if the passed in Merc Profile ID is currently on the player's team
01592 BOOLEAN IsMercOnTeam(UINT8 ubMercID)
01593 {
01594       UINT16 cnt;
01595       UINT8       ubLastTeamID;
01596       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
01597 
01598       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
01599 
01600       ubLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01601 
01602   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01603   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= ubLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01604       {     
01605             if ( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == ubMercID )
01606             {
01607                   if( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
01608                         return(TRUE);
01609             }
01610       }
01611 
01612       return(FALSE);
01613 }
01614 
01615 // ATE: Added this new function for contract renewals
01616 BOOLEAN IsMercOnTeamAndAlive(UINT8 ubMercID)
01617 {
01618       UINT16 cnt;
01619       UINT8       ubLastTeamID;
01620       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
01621 
01622       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
01623 
01624       ubLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01625 
01626   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01627   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= ubLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01628       {     
01629             if ( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == ubMercID )
01630             {
01631                   if( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
01632       {
01633         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 )
01634         {
01635                           return(TRUE);
01636         }
01637       }
01638             }
01639       }
01640 
01641       return(FALSE);
01642 }

01696 // GetSoldierIDFromMercID() Gets the Soldier ID from the Merc Profile ID, else returns -1
01697 INT16 GetSoldierIDFromMercID(UINT8 ubMercID)
01698 {
01699       UINT16 cnt;
01700       UINT8       ubLastTeamID;
01701       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
01702 
01703       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
01704 
01705       ubLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01706 
01707   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01708   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= ubLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
01709       {     
01710             if ( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile == ubMercID )
01711             {
01712                   if( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
01713                         return( cnt );
01714             }
01715       }
01716 
01717       return( -1 );
01718 }
